dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.evt.SignatureSecurityEvent
dataStructure.description:
A SignatureSecurityEvent is an event detected by a signature-based sensor (e.g. an Intrusion Detection System (IDS) or anti-virus software)

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SignatureSecurityEvent

child.name: numberOfPackets
child.description:
Total packets collected by the sensor for the event

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: numberOfPackets

child.name: numberOfBytes
child.description:
Total bytes collected by the sensor for the event.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: numberOfBytes

child.name: packetCaptureData
child.description:
Text field to capture PCAP (packet capture) data (i.e. full packets involved in the SecurityEvent)

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: packetCaptureData

child.name: dataFlowDirection
child.description:
This indicates the overall flow of data for the connection - inbound implies that more data (bytes) was received by the destination than by the source. Enumeration values: inbound outbound

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: dataFlowDirection

child.name: securityEventEndpoint
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityEventEndpointInvolvedInSignatureEvent

This association end is optional
child.label: securityEventEndpoint

child.name: securitySignature
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecuritySignatureDetectedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: securitySignature
